amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds for the Greenhouse Gas Reduction Fund.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit funds for section 134 of the Clean Air Act, the Greenhouse Gas Reduction Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 211 (Roll no. 384).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 211 (Roll no. 384).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
